content: cosy cushy reversible cowl worked in 2 colour brioche **yarn** rowan pure wool worsted 100g or equivalent 100gm 200m/219yd **mc** = 1 ball shade 189 windsor **cc** = 1 ball shade 150 damson **needle** 4 0mm/us6 circular needles 60cm/24 **gauge** approx 16 sts per 10cm/4 in brioche pattern **size** approx 60cm/ 23 ½ circumference & 28cm/11 deep
